== Description ==

Navigates through an array and encodes the values to be used in a URL.

Uses a callback to pass the value of the array back to the function as a string.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php urlencode_deep( $value ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$value|array&#124;string|The array or string to be encoded.|required}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||array&#124;string|$value The encoded array (or string from the callback).}}
